flawed_nl_solution:
He caught 200*0.55=11 pounds more salmon than trout
So he caught 200+11=<<200+11=211>>211 pounds of salmon
He caught 211*2=<<211*2=422>>422 pounds of tuna
So in total, he caught 422+211+200=<<422+211+200=833>>833 pounds of fish
#### 833

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 110.00000000000001, not 11. It appears the decimal point was misplaced.
